resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104250</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104250</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206694</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Molecular Stepping Stones</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Molekulare Tretensteine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pierres Moléculaires d'Progression</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pedras Molecular Pisar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pietre Molecolari Fare un passo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοριακές να περπατήσει πέτρες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Piedras Moleculares El Caminar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">features online activities, including simulations, to help students understand 10 key concepts underlying many biological processes. Topics include atomic structure, random motion, spatial equilibrium, strong chemical bonds, compounds, intermolecular forces, self-assembly, proteins, chemical reactions and catalysis, DNA, and biologica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Merkmale Online-Dienst, einschließlich 
Simulationen, Kursteilnehmern helfen, 10 Schlüsselkonzepte zu 
verstehen zugrundeliegend viele biologische Prozesse. Themen 
schließen Atomstruktur, gelegentliche Bewegung, räumliches 
Gleichgewicht, starke chemische Bindungen, Mittel, intermolekulare 
Kräfte, Selbst-Versammlung, Proteine, chemische Reaktionen und 
Katalyse, DNA und biologica ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activités en ligne de dispositifs, y compris des 
simulations, pour aider des étudiants à comprendre 10 concepts 
principaux sous-tendants beaucoup de processus biologiques. Les 
sujets incluent la structure atomique, mouvement aléatoire, 
équilibre spatial, obligations chimiques fortes, composés, forces 
intermoléculaires, art de l'auto-portrait-assembly, protéines, réactions et 
catalyse chimique, ADN, et biologica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atividades em linha das características, 
including simulações, para ajudar a estudantes compreender 10 
conceitos chaves subjacentes muitos processos biológicos. Os 
tópicos incluem a estrutura atômica, movimento aleatório, 
equilíbrio spatial, ligações químicas fortes, compostos, forças 
intermolecular, self-conjunto, proteínas, reações e catalysis 
químico, DNA, e biologica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attività in linea delle caratteristiche, compreso
le simulazioni, aiutare gli allievi a capire 10 concetti chiave 
di fondo molti processi biologici. I soggetti includono la 
struttura atomica, movimento casuale, equilibrio spaziale, legami 
chimici forti, residui, forze intermolecolari, auto-complessivo, 
proteine, reazioni e catalisi chimica, DNA e biologica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαρακτηρίζει τις σε απευθείας σύνδεση δραστηριότητες, 
συμπεριλαμβανομένων των προσομοιώσεων, για να βοηθήσει τους 
σπουδαστές να καταλάβουν 10 βασικές έννοιες που κρύβονται κάτω 
από πολλές βιολογικές διαδικασίες. Τα θέματα περιλαμβάνουν
την ατομική δομή, την τυχαία κίνηση, τη χωρική ισορροπία, τους 
ισχυρούς χημικούς δεσμούς, τις ενώσεις, τις διαμοριακές 
δυνάμεις, την μόνος-συμβολική γλώσσα, τις πρωτεϊ'νες, τις χημική
αντιδράσεις και την κατάλυση, το DNA, και το biologica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">actividades en línea de las características, 
incluyendo simulaciones, ayudar a estudiantes a entender 10 conceptos 
dominantes subyacentes muchos procesos biológicos. Los asuntos 
incluyen la estructura atómica, movimiento al azar, equilibrio 
espacial, los vínculos químicos fuertes, los compuestos, las fuerzas
intermoleculares, uno mismo-ensamblaje, las proteínas, las reacciones
y catálisis química, DNA, y biologica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206694</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104250</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/molecular-stepping-stones</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
